com.remote.remote2d.engine.entity

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.remote.remote2d.engine.entity.EditorObject
      • com.remote.remote2d.engine.entity.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    R2DFileSaver

    public class Entity
extends EditorObject
    The basic class for all moving things in the game. Things such as the player, bullets, enemies, mechanized objects, etc. Anything that needs to tick(). Note, that Entities themselves DO NOT tick, their components do. Entities themselves are the GameObject, and Components control the Entities.
    Author:
    Flafla2

    • Method Detail

      • spawnEntityInWorld

        public void spawnEntityInWorld()
        Tells the entity (and more importantly its components) that they have spawned. In other words, calls Component.onEntitySpawn() for all components.

      • removeEntityFromWorld

        public void removeEntityFromWorld()
        Removes this entity from its map's entity list.

        public java.util.ArrayList<Collider> getColliders()

      • getPossibleColliders

        public java.util.ArrayList<Collider> getPossibleColliders(Collider coll,
                                                 Vector2 movement)
        Assuming this Entity is STATIC (not moving): Calculates any potential colliders from this Entity that would collide with the given Collider
        Parameters:
        coll - Any moving collider
        movement - The movement vector of said collider
        Returns:
        If this Entity collides with coll, list of all colliders involved with this Entity. Otherwise, null.

      • getParent

        public Entity getParent()
        The parent of this entity.

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(Vector2 vec)
        Calculates if a given Vector2 is inside this entity, using its colliders.
        Parameters:
        vec - Any point

      • renderColliders

        public void renderColliders()
        Renders all of this entity's colliders for debugging purposes.

      • getBroadPhaseCollider

        public Collider getBroadPhaseCollider()
        All of this Entity's colliders are guaranteed to be inside this collider.
        Returns:
        null if there are no colliders, otherwise the broad phase collider.

      • getGeneralCollider

        public Collider getGeneralCollider()
        A general collider that encompasses this Entity's rendered area. NOT to be used for collision detection.

      • getDim

        public Vector2 getDim()
        This entity's dimensions.

      • tick

        public void tick(int i,
        int j,
        int k)
        Responsible for all logic. This should only be called by Remote2D.tick(int, int, int). Also calls Component.tick(int, int, int) for all components.
        Parameters:
        i - Mouse X
        j - Mouse Y
        k - Mouse Down (1 if left mouse, 2 if right mouse, 0 if no mouse)

      • render

        public void render(boolean editor,
          float interpolation)
        Responsible for all rendering. This should only be called by Remote2D.render(float). DOES NOT call rendering for components.
        Parameters:
        editor - If the Entity is being rendered in the editor (useful for debug graphics)
        interpolation - A float between 0.0 - 1.0 detailing how far in between the last tick and the next tick this render is.

      • updatePos

        public void updatePos()
        Ignores interpolation for rendering this tick. Useful after teleporting an Entity; to not make it quickly move to its new position but rather pop up right there.

      • renderPreview

        public void renderPreview(float interpolation)
        Renders a preview of this entity
